Class EnhancedPushButton 

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.FocusWidget
              com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.ButtonBase
                  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.CustomButton
                      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PushButton
                          de.eckhartarnold.client.EnhancedPushButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasFocus, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasHTML, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasText, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesClickEvents, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesFocusEvents, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesKeyboardEvents, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesMouseEvents
public class EnhancedPushButton
				
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PushButton
				
implements com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesMouseEvents

An enhanced version of the GWT PushButton class that also fires mouse events and not just click events.

This allows to attach tool-tips to "enhanced" push buttons.

Author:
ecki
